item.itunes:subtitle: So here's the thing. The Wifi is terrible at E3. For that matter the Wifi is terrible in Canada as well (sorry Marcus!). For those reasons and a few others, our podcast was truncated this week, and we actually lost 10-15 minutes of the show. Sorry!
item.itunes:summary:
So here's the thing. The Wifi is terrible at E3. For that matter the Wifi is terrible in Canada as well (sorry Marcus!). For those reasons and a few others, our podcast was truncated this week, and we actually lost 10-15 minutes of the show. Sorry! Doesn't mean that is still there isn't excellent however! Think of it as cutting off the fat on an excellent piece of steak maybe.
In any case, when the episode does pick up, we will be talking about Nintendo Land, so dive right in and enjoy the show!
Be sure send us in your comments and questions to tips@infendo.com if you wish to be a part of the show. You can also follow Essel, Harrison and I on Twitter at @EsselPratt, @hmilfeld, @Verius and @Infendo_Eugene, respectively. Thank you all for listening in, and enjoy the show!
item.itunes:author: Infendo.com

item.itunes:subtitle: Today started off great. I woke up, had myself a little run, then booted up my laptop only to discover boom, no Internet. That wouldn't have been a problem if I wasn't meeting with a couple of great looking gentleman over Skype to bring you today's Inf...
item.itunes:summary:
Today started off great. I woke up, had myself a little run, then booted up my laptop only to discover boom, no Internet. That wouldn't have been a problem if I wasn't meeting with a couple of great looking gentleman over Skype to bring you today's Infendo Radio! But I digress.
We have a packed show for you this week, and a few new hosts to boot! Join Essel, Michael, Thomas, and myself as we discuss this week in Nintendo in anticipation for E3 next week!
Be sure send us in your comments and questions to tips@infendo.com if you wish to be a part of the show. You can also follow Essel, Harrison and I on Twitter at @EsselPratt, @hmilfeld, and @Infendo_Eugene, respectively. Thank you all for listening in, and enjoy the show!
item.itunes:author: Infendo.com

In a week’s time we will know almost everything there is to know about what Nintendo’s strategy for the upcoming year is. Next week we will have a better idea of what type of unique gameplay we [...]
item.itunes:subtitle: Can you believe that E3 is already going to be just over a week away!? Crazy isn't it? In a week's time we will know almost everything there is to know about what Nintendo's strategy for the upcoming year is.
item.itunes:summary:
Can you believe that E3 is already going to be just over a week away!? Crazy isn't it? In a week's time we will know almost everything there is to know about what Nintendo's strategy for the upcoming year is. Next week we will have a better idea of what type of unique gameplay we can expect over the course of the Wii U's lifespan.
Excited yet? We here at Infendo Radio are as well! We hope you join us this week as we discuss Wii U rumors leading up to this year's show, talk about new games on the horizon for 3DS, and we even discuss a few real world boss fights. This week's show is jammed to the rafters with whimsy, so this is an episode you definitely don't want to miss!
Be sure send us in your comments and questions to tips@infendo.com if you wish to be a part of the show. You can also follow Essel, Harrison and I on Twitter at @EsselPratt, @hmilfeld, and @Infendo_Eugene, respectively. Thank you all for listening in, and enjoy the show!
item.itunes:author: Infendo.com

Where oh where has my little podcast gone, oh where oh where can it be? Well folks Infendo Radio is back, and this week Essel and Harrison join me in discussing all things Nintendo. Start your weekend off right with what is sure to be one of the best podcasts you have ever listened to!
If you would like to contribute to the show, you can email us your questions/comments to tip@infendo.com. Be sure to follow Essel, Harrison, and myself on twitter as well!

All this adds up to delays, and delays are bad. I intendo (see [...]
item.itunes:subtitle: This week lots of things went wrong. Took me longer than expected to edit the podcast, I still haven't figured out how best to upload the podcast to you fine folks, I went out to the local brewery one too many times. All this adds up to delays,
item.itunes:summary:
This week lots of things went wrong. Took me longer than expected to edit the podcast, I still haven't figured out how best to upload the podcast to you fine folks, I went out to the local brewery one too many times. All this adds up to delays, and delays are bad. I intendo (see what I did there?) to make it up to you. Chris and I have vowed to record another podcast this week, and I hope to have it up this weekend. Double podcast weekend!
This week I changed up the audio for the podcast. Eugene's voice track is on the left, and Chris has his voice track on the right. We need your input on whether or not this is a good thing. Please let us know in the comments if you like the voice tracks split in stereo, or if you would prefer a mono track. Thanks for listening, and please send us your questions and comments to tips@infendo.com.
iTunes feed Radio Feed
item.itunes:author: Infendo.com

This week join Chris and I as we talk about things that matter in the world of Nintendo, while also deviating a bit to talk about [...]
item.itunes:subtitle: Can you hear that? Yeah, it's the sound of your neighbors leaving their houses to go…outside. It's warmer, people are out doing yardwork, and Infendo Radio is on again. This week join Chris and I as we talk about things that matter in the world of Nint...
item.itunes:summary:
Can you hear that? Yeah, it's the sound of your neighbors leaving their houses to go…outside. It's warmer, people are out doing yardwork, and Infendo Radio is on again. This week join Chris and I as we talk about things that matter in the world of Nintendo, while also deviating a bit to talk about other happenings in the video game industry.
If you like our show, please let us know about it! If you hate us, well, how could we be better the next time? Please send in your questions for the show to tips@infendo.com, or you can just ask us in the comments below. We would love to have your questions aired on the next show! Be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell all your friends about the show!
iTunes feed Radio Feed
If you like this post, be sure to follow me on Twitter @infendo_eugene and check out my personal blog at Nintentunes.com! Chris has one now too! @ZKS_Chris

item.itunes:summary:
Well we're one day late, but our fourth Infendo Radio is finally here! This week we discuss a Swapnote wedding, 3DS sales, and talk about all the games we have been playing. Congratulations to Don Thacker for his wedding proposal, and a huge thanks for sending in his Swapnote video. That sets the bar really high for anyone with a girlfriend who listens the show or has seen the Youtube video (shown above), so good luck guys!

item.title: Infendo Radio: Third time’s a charm edition
item.dc:creator: Eugene Allen
item.description: Once in awhile, something comes along that is so awesome it is hard to put into words. I’m not saying, but I’m saying that Infendo Radio is one of those things. This week your two handsome hosts talk about the world of Nintendo and discuss such things as Nintendo Direct, Pokemon Black/White 2, and even dive into [...]
item.itunes:subtitle: Once in awhile, something comes along that is so awesome it is hard to put into words. I'm not saying, but I'm saying that Infendo Radio is one of those things. This week your two handsome hosts talk about the world of Nintendo and discuss such things ...
item.itunes:summary:
Once in awhile, something comes along that is so awesome it is hard to put into words. I'm not saying, but I'm saying that Infendo Radio is one of those things. This week your two handsome hosts talk about the world of Nintendo and discuss such things as Nintendo Direct, Pokemon Black/White 2, and even dive into Resident Evil Revelations. Thank you all that have listened to the show the last couple of weeks, you are the reason for us to keep recording week after week. We hope to continue on a weekly basis, but we need your help!
Please rate us on iTunes, and don't forget to leave a comment below! We would love to have your questions aired on the podcast, so drop us a line at tips@infendo.com. Please let us know how we can improve, we value your feedback. I upped the bitrate of the podcast, so the file is slightly larger, but he quality is better, so hopefully the trade-off is valuable. Hope you enjoy the show! I know we enjoyed talking about all things Nintendo!
iTunes feed Radio Feed
If you like this post, be sure to follow me on Twitter @infendo_eugene and check out my personal blog at Nintentunes.com!
item.itunes:author: Infendo.com

item.itunes:summary:
Some said it would never happen. Others laughed when the thought of it was proposed. Well here it is folks, the second week of Infendo Radio. We didn't receive any emails in time for the show, but we still would like to hear your feedback! Have a question you'd like to have asked on the show? Send it in to tips@infendo.com!
This week we talk about fake Pokemon, questing for dragons, and even about hunting monsters. If you would like us to keep podcasting, let us know in the comments below. This time, Eugene's microphone situation is fixed so the podcast sounds at least 14X better than before. Hope you enjoy the show!

item.itunes:summary:
By popular demand, Infendo Radio has returned. We are going to try any make it a weekly event once again, but we're counting on you all for your support in the matter. After listening to the show, make sure to comment below and send in your questions/comments to tips@infendo.com. We love reading all your emails, and who knows, you could be featured on the next podcast!
This week Eugene joins forces with his good friend Chris to discuss Wii U NFC functionality, 3DS sales, and even dip in on the dark side to discuss Playstation Vita. This is most definitely a podcast you don't want to miss, so what are you waiting for? Go download the show!

item.title: This week’s Infendo Radio: “3D is ugly”

item.itunes:subtitle: In case you haven't heard, Infendo Radio got a 1up this month. It no longer rambles. It's short and sweet. And your hosts have a lot of fun recording it. - Whether you used to listen to Infendo Radio during the Scott days, or have never listened before,
item.itunes:summary:
In case you haven't heard, Infendo Radio got a 1up this month. It no longer rambles. It's short and sweet. And your hosts have a lot of fun recording it.
Whether you used to listen to Infendo Radio during the Scott days, or have never listened before, we wanna change that. And we're giving away free loot to entice you.
Here's how it works: Listen to this week's 40-minute episode, count the number of times we say "Wii," and email us with the correct answer. We'll then select at random one of the correct answers and ship out a brand spanking new copy of Kirby's Epic Yarn when it releases on Oct. 17. To make it extra fun, we'll also be sending swag, accessories, and shovelware at random to correct participants.
Winners will be announced on next week's show. So without further adieu, join Derek and Blake as they discuss Wii Party, easy games, 3DS pricing, On the Radar (new segment), Zelda, and more.
Radio Feed iTunes Feed Download links below

item.itunes:subtitle: Okay guys, let's get started!Â Alexis? Will? Guys? Oh.Â I see how it is, tell Sean we're doing something fun in the Infendo recording studio, and then sneak off into the city to party it up without him.Â Look at these text messages and voice-mails!
item.itunes:summary:
Okay guys, let's get started!Â Alexis? Will? Guys? Oh.Â I see how it is, tell Sean we're doing something fun in the Infendo recording studio, and then sneak off into the city to party it up without him.Â Look at these text messages and voice-mails! Parties? On the run from the KGB? You guys never invite me! Fine, I can have fun all by myself.Â I've got my DS, my Wii, and this week's release list.Â Chuck E. Cheese Party Games came out this week. I'll have my own party. It'll ...be ...great. Jerks.
(Due to co-host absences, Infendo Radio 192 has been postponed - please enjoy this special episode "Sean and the empty studio" dramatization. We promise, it's chock full of Sean. Infendo Radio should return next week, as scheduled.)
